properties.name: Black Pearl Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Rgalston 460 dufferin ave, winnipeg mbExcellent selection of coffee beans and blends from around the world. Also sells brewed coffee to go.

properties.name: Cake Clothing
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonWomen\'s clothing boutique at the centre of the Exchange District\'s growing trendy retail hub. Corner of Albert St. and McDermot Ave.

properties.name: Candy & Dolls clothing
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonWomen\'s fashion boutique.

properties.name: Central Park
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonWinnipeg\'s Central Park is a small and charming green space in the middle of one of the city\'s most dense neighborhoods. Bound by Cumberland, Carlton, Qu\'Appelle, and Edmonton.

properties.name: High & Lonesome (Times Changed) Club
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonCharming little tavern and venue for C&W, Bluegrass, Blues and Folk performers. 234 Main St, at York Ave.

properties.name: Hooper's Bazzar
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonOne of the best shops in the Exchange District, Hooper\'s strays from the pack of Winnipeg antique dealers by specializing in Modern furniture from the 1950\'s and 60\'s. Decent selection of vintage clothing and records, as well.

properties.name: Italia Barbers
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonMen\'s barbershop served by two long-time veterns of the trade.

properties.name: Jeffrey's Barber
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonThe place to go for sports talk, off-color jokes, and great haircut by the meticulous Jeffrey. Corner of Maryland St. and Sargent Ave.

properties.name: Main Meats & Groceteria
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonA long-time Main Street institution heavily patroned by the remaining residential population, and more and more by students and workers at the nearby Aboriginal Centre. 654 Main St

properties.name: Metro Meats
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonFamily-operated corner store specializing in Kulbassa and other Ukrainian meats.

properties.name: Millenium Library
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonThe Main Branch of the Winnipeg Public Library system. Recently expanded and renovated. The Local History room alone is worth the visit. Corner of Donald St. and Graham Ave.

properties.name: Natural Cycle
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonBicycle repair shop and courier service. 91B Albert St. 957-5762

properties.name: Royal Albert Arms Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Rgalston Legendary underground rock venue.

properties.name: Vault Salon and Spa
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonTrendy hairstyling establishment.

properties.name: Winnipeg Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Rgalston Opened in 1881, The Winnipeg is the oldest surviving hotel in the city. Rececently, it joined the nearby Windsor, Woodbine and the High & Lonesome in hosting live roots music.

properties.name: Winnipeg Vacuum
properties.description: Posted by RgalstonDealing in used vaccums, equipment and repairs. Corner of Corydon Ave. and Liac St.

properties.name: Woodbine Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Rgalston Bar and hostel. Opened in 1878, it is the oldest drinking estableshment in Winnipeg.
